00020 #define           AIM_LINK_NUM_LINKS                                    3
00021 
00022 #define           AIM_LINK_LINK_OFFSET_Y                    94//90
00023 
00024 #define           AIM_LINK_LINK_WIDTH                                   420
00025 #define           AIM_LINK_LINK_HEIGHT                            70
00026 
00027 #define           AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_X                           LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 40
00028 #define           AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_Y                           LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 91
00029 
00030 #define           AIM_LINK_FUNERAL_LINK_X                   AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_X
00031 #define           AIM_LINK_FUNERAL_LINK_Y                   AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_Y + AIM_LINK_LINK_OFFSET_Y
00032 
00033 #define           AIM_LINK_INSURANCE_LINK_X                 AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_X
00034 #define           AIM_LINK_INSURANCE_LINK_Y                 AIM_LINK_FUNERAL_LINK_Y + AIM_LINK_LINK_OFFSET_Y

00051 UINT32            guiInsuranceLink;

00053                                           BOBBYR_BOOKMARK,
00054                                           FUNERAL_BOOKMARK,
00055                                           INSURANCE_BOOKMARK};

00066 
00067 BOOLEAN EnterAimLinks()
00068 {
00069   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00070       UINT16                              usPosY;
00071       INT16                               i;
00072 
00073       InitAimDefaults();
00074       InitAimMenuBar();
00075 
00076       // load the Bobby link graphic and add it
00077       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00078       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_BOBBYRAYLINK );
00079       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBobbyLink));
00080 
00081       // load the Funeral graphic and add it
00082       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00083       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_MORTUARYLINK );
00084       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFuneralLink));
00085 
00086       // load the Insurance graphic and add it
00087       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00088       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_INSURANCELINK );
00089       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsuranceLink));
00090 
00091       usPosY = AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_Y;
00092       for(i=0; i<AIM_LINK_NUM_LINKS; i++)
00093       {
00094             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedLinkRegion[i], AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_X, usPosY , AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_X + AIM_LINK_LINK_WIDTH, (UINT16)(usPosY + AIM_LINK_LINK_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00095                                                  CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectLinkRegionCallBack ); 
00096             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedLinkRegion[i]); 
00097             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedLinkRegion[i], 0, gubLinkPages[i]);   
00098             usPosY += AIM_LINK_LINK_OFFSET_Y;
00099       }
00100       
00101 
00102       RenderAimLinks();
00103       return(TRUE);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void ExitAimLinks()
00107 {
00108       INT16                               i;
00109 
00110       RemoveAimDefaults();
00111 
00112       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBobbyLink);
00113       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiFuneralLink);
00114       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiInsuranceLink);
00115 
00116       for(i=0; i<AIM_LINK_NUM_LINKS; i++)
00117             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedLinkRegion[i]);
00118 
00119       ExitAimMenuBar();
00120 
00121 }

00128 void RenderAimLinks()
00129 {
00130   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00131 
00132       DrawAimDefaults();
00133       DisableAimButton();
00134 
00135       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBobbyLink);
00136   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_X, AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00137 
00138       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFuneralLink);
00139   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, AIM_LINK_FUNERAL_LINK_X, AIM_LINK_FUNERAL_LINK_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00140 //    DrawTextToScreen(AimLinkText[AIM_LINK_FUNERAL], AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_X, AIM_LINK_LINK_TEXT_2_Y, AIM_LINK_LINK_WIDTH, AIM_LINK_FONT, AIM_LINK_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00141 
00142       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsuranceLink);
00143   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, AIM_LINK_INSURANCE_LINK_X, AIM_LINK_INSURANCE_LINK_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00144 //    DrawTextToScreen(AimLinkText[AIM_LINK_LISTENING], AIM_LINK_BOBBY_LINK_X, AIM_LINK_LINK_TEXT_3_Y, AIM_LINK_LINK_WIDTH, AIM_LINK_FONT, AIM_LINK_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00145 
00146       //Draw Link Title
00147       DrawTextToScreen(AimLinkText[AIM_LINK_TITLE], AIM_LINK_TITLE_X, AIM_LINK_TITLE_Y, AIM_LINK_TITLE_WIDTH, AIM_LINK_TITLE_FONT, AIM_LINK_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00148 
00149   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00150       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00151   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00152 }

00154 void SelectLinkRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00155 { 
00156       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00157       {
00158       }
00159       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
00160       {
00161       }
00162       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00163       {
00164             UINT32      gNextLaptopPage;
00165 
00166             gNextLaptopPage = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00167 
00168             GoToWebPage( gNextLaptopPage );
00169       }
00170       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00171       {
00172       } 
00173 }
